action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wererat makes two attacks, using Scratch or Hand Crossbow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

action.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 11}. {@actSaveFail} The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it instead becomes a Wererat under the DM's control and has 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this wererat's curse for 24 hours.

action.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
